about_the_game:
Glowlings is a thrilling top-down roguelite set in a post-apocalyptic world where humanity has vanished. You play as a Glowling, a glowing creature fighting to survive against the dangerous leftovers of humanity. Battle waves of strange enemies like broken toasters, radioactive trash, and tennis ball machines.

Collect scrap from defeated enemies to purchase new items and weapons. Combine these with your character's unique abilities to create powerful synergies and overcome increasingly challenging foes. Equip up to four different weapons simultaneously, and choose from a variety of characters tailored to suit your preferred playstyle. Strategically manage your collected scrap to select the best-fitting items from a pool of over 100 unique upgrades, granting you enhanced abilities and stats. Are you ready to rescue your species from chaos?
